title: 148862698.when Life Gives You Lemons
excerpt: If you’re reading this, it’s highly likely you have a life abound with resources, tools, connections, and opportunities.

children.text: If you’re reading this, it’s highly likely you have a life abound with resources, tools, connections, and opportunities.
And yet we often spend so much of our lives—so much of our time—working to get more of what we already have.
Thing is, that's not how you make a well-lived life (or a successful business).
Certainly a higher quality input will give you a better output, but chasing more (better) lemons is never the point.
